summary: In this mod it'll make your adventure more fun, with 4 new craftable weapons and armor. Also some npcs that can be located in Riverwood Trader, Riverwood Sleeping Giants Inn and last but not least The Bannered Mane in White run.
descriptionHtml:
Hello, I am a solo modder trying to spread the happiness. In this mod called the "More Fun Mod 0.02" I will present you 4 new craftable weapons/armor. Also some npcs that can be located within' these locations, Riverwood Sleeping giants inn, Riverwood RIverwood Trader, and last but not least WHiterun The Bannered Mane. (NOTE: The NPC in Riverwood Trader is quite tough, so don't try attacking it at level 10 since you'll get pooped all over on)Â 

Please leave me more suggestions down below, thank you :D
author: UnknownModder84
